title: Block Weight Limit
description: Block weight must remain below consensus maximum.
rationale: Protects validation resource bounds and deterministic chain rules.

title: No Double Spend
description: Blocks and transactions cannot spend the same UTXO twice.
rationale: Prevents inflation and preserves deterministic ownership transitions.

title: Standard Script Relay
description: Default relay policy prefers standard script templates.
rationale: Reduces abuse surface and keeps mempool operations predictable.

title: RBF Replacement Policy
description: Transaction replacement acceptance follows fee-bump and signaling policy.
rationale: Balances fee market efficiency with mempool stability.
